price: Mbagezaho ubutumwa bwa Nyagasani wanjye, kandi ndi umujyanama wanyu w’umwizerwa.
arabic: أُبَلِّغُكُمۡ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّي وَأَنَا۠ لَكُمۡ نَاصِحٌ أَمِينٌ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: uballighukum risālāti rabbī wa-anā lakum nāṣiḥun amīnun
